lead_paragraph: Deniz Yucel, a German-Turkish journalist arrested last week in Turkey, views his solitary confinement in Turkey as "almost a form of torture," but said his health and mental condition are good, the German newspaper he reports for said on Sunday.
snippet: Deniz Yucel, a German-Turkish journalist arrested last week in Turkey, views his solitary confinement in Turkey as "almost a form of torture," but said his health and mental condition are good, the German newspaper he reports for said on Sunday....

headline.main: Out in the Cold: New U.S. Budget Priorities Threaten Housing Aid Programs
